languages.text: "Хейнрикс, я, оказывается, враг Человечества. Не хочешь высказаться?"
"Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс, я, оказывается, враг Человечества. Не хочешь высказаться?"

traits.locale_text: "Would you look at that, Heinrix. I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"
"Would you look at that, Heinrix. I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"
"Would you look at that, Heinrix. I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"
"Would you look at that, Heinrix. I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"
"Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"
"Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"

languages.text: “你看看，海因里希，总有人一直把我当成人类之敌。可以听听你的高见吗？”
languages.original_text: "Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"

traits.locale_text: “你看看，海因里希，总有人一直把我当成人类之敌。可以听听你的高见吗？”

languages.text: 「ハインリックス、いいか。{mf|俺|私}は以前よりずっと人類の敵だった。何か言いたいことはあるか？」
languages.original_text: "Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、いいか。{mf|俺|私}は以前よりずっと人類の敵だった。何か言いたいことはあるか？」

languages.text: «Pues menuda sorpresa. Heinrix, resulta que he sido enemig{mf|o|a} de la Humanidad todo este tiempo. ¿Tiene algo que decir al respecto?».
languages.original_text: "Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"

traits.locale_text: «Pues menuda sorpresa. Heinrix, resulta que he sido enemig{mf|o|a} de la Humanidad todo este tiempo. ¿Tiene algo que decir al respecto?».

languages.text: "Was sagt man dazu, Heinrix? Ich war die ganze Zeit über ein Feind der Menschheit. Möchtet Ihr das kommentieren?"
languages.original_text: "Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"

traits.locale_text: "Was sagt man dazu, Heinrix? Ich war die ganze Zeit über ein Feind der Menschheit. Möchtet Ihr das kommentieren?"

languages.text: « Voyez-vous ça, Heinrix ! Il se trouve que je suis {mf|un ennemi|une ennemie} de l'humanité depuis le début. Un commentaire, peut-être ? »
languages.original_text: "Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"

traits.locale_text: « Voyez-vous ça, Heinrix ! Il se trouve que je suis {mf|un ennemi|une ennemie} de l'humanité depuis le début. Un commentaire, peut-être ? »

languages.text: "Şu işe bakar mısın Heinrix? Meğerse bunca zamandır İnsanlığın düşmanıymışım. Ne düşünüyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Would you look at that, Heinrix — I have been an enemy of Humanity all along. Care to comment?"

traits.locale_text: "Şu işe bakar mısın Heinrix? Meğerse bunca zamandır İnsanlığın düşmanıymışım. Bir yorumun olacak mı bu konuda?"
